channel.title: Teleporting,x-button
channel.description:
If I click on a teleport, EX : Monster
Then I get like 4-5 options. But if I don't want to tele and I click away .. You know .. Like on the map .. It doesn't go away .. :s I have to teleport / log out.
If I open something like the command : ' ::info ' I can't close it cus there's no x-button ..
Please help ? Thanks ;)

item.title: Teleporting,x-button
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Picture please?

I think u dont look good for that last one.
For the teleprt.
Click on the monster teleport.
Then look in ur run.bat (server sided)
It will say something like:

= button id.

Now open ur clickingbuttons.java and search for this :

####= button id from the run.bat

Now if u see that case it must say enough

Read full topic
